description: Search leaked databases for email addresses, phone numbers, usernames, domains, and other identifiers. View categorized results across multiple sources to pinpoint relevant exposures. Speed investigations with targeted lookups and streamlined retrieval of findings.

tools.name: osint_search
tools.description: Search leaked databases for email addresses, phone numbers, usernames, domains, or other identifiers. Returns results from multiple databases with categorized information. Note: Large searches may take 4-5 seconds. Use lower limit values for faster responses.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5000). Lower values = faster responses. Range: 100-9000

query.description: The search query (email, phone, username, domain, etc.)

tools.name: osint_get_results
tools.description: Get paginated results from a previous OSINT search by search ID. Returns entries from a specific database and page.

searchId.description: The search ID from a previous osint_search

tools.name: osint_list_databases
tools.description: List all databases found in a previous OSINT search by search ID.

searchId.description: The search ID from a previous osint_search
